body: Hi guys, I´m trying to use Grizzly Bear and I´m goind through the following issue: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/1M-yj*HdTy5fF2bIw4rtYS2gnIvL52QCaTuFecmkWUH0b-kb0-9myggkaqgupX1f76LW3mW5Ylh3aapuPLCV4TzqSVnTSPJG/16016_GrizzlyBearIssue.png)Any ideas of what might be going on? Thanks, Alejandro
topic: Grizzly Bear_Unsupported operand type(s) for +: 'NoneType' and 'str'
